extension.summary: Watch movies from the Paramount Vault
extension.description:
Watch movies from the Paramount Vault, including classics like Masters of the Universe, Hamlet, Missing In Action and There Goes The Neighbourhood.
[B]Note:[/B] The content in this addon is geoblocked for viewership in only the United States. The YouTube plugin for Kodi is required to be installed to use this plugin.
extension.disclaimer: The author is not affiliated either with Paramount Pictures or Viacom
